Reviews.Title: Wonderful phone at a wonderful price
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Dandridge
Reviews.Content: Great [...]. Acouple were worn alittle but work great. I just put my sim card right in and it worked! I love the bb too. Don't know how I survrived as long as I did without one. For email and Internet to work you have to activate it through At&t;

Reviews.Title: Old phone, but great starter for kid.
Reviews.Author: Patsy L. Rosas
Reviews.Content: This purchase was for my daughter (13 yrs) as a starter phone.  It is a little bulky, but easy for her smaller hands to work, and the full keyboard was perfect as she uses text more than talk.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 8700c
Reviews.Author: D. Dancu
Reviews.Content: Few minor dings and scratches, but advised of them before purchase.Functions fine and delivery was exactly as promised and timely.Reliable source and would purchase again from him

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 8700 - Like New !
Reviews.Author: Leonard Fleming
Reviews.Content: Whilst it was a very slight exaggeration to say that this product was like new, there were only minor little marks such as one could reasonably expect to find on a used product, so I think we should let that one go through OK !The battery wasn't any good but I didn't really expect that to be ' like new ' so again no real disappointment there.The phone worked fine with a replacement battery and all bits and pieces were in the package such as Charger, Holster and CDIn conclusion I would say that this was good value and I would have no hesitation in buying from this seller again

Reviews.Title: Works fine, just a little dated.
Reviews.Author: amfad1025
Reviews.Content: Got this for my hubby for in between his upgrade. He says it works fine, but it's a little bulky, being an older model and it's a little difficult to maneuver around the programs with the side wheel. It just takes some getting used to, but it is a good little in-betweener.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: denali dame
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the product I ordered.  It was exactly as it was described and it arrived quickly.  I would order from this merchant again.

Reviews.Title: Exceded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Catherine K. Wadsworth
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry arrived quickly, looked great and is still doing great.  I am terrifically happy with the whole experience.  I will go to this site the next time I need a new phone.

Reviews.Title: quik on the draw
Reviews.Author: Electric Boogaloo
Reviews.Content: I was a little apprehensive being the first sale for this seller, but she was quite responsive to acknowledge me and send the product. It arrived quickly and in the condition promised. KUDOS!!!

Reviews.Title: QUEJAS
Reviews.Author: Jose Meregote
Reviews.Content: Compre el telñefono hace 15 dias .. la relacion precio-Telefono, la entrega estuvo entre los dias establecidoo, excelente pero tuve problemas por q Fueron especifico Diciendo q Estaba desbloqueado PARA USAR PARA CUALQUIER Operadora nivel A, y mundial Resulta q no pude activar mi linea en el mismo ... perdiendo dinero tiempooo y ----
